'''Tarn River''' was a short river in central [[Netheril]] that descended from the [[Lodestar Mountains]].
document_data.Geography: The river was filled by spring meltwater and summer rain, cascading from the Lodestars down to [[Hidden Lake]]. Along the way it passed through the [[Hidden Forest]] and the city of [[Algid]].
